casebody.data:
Marvin KITCHENS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 13, 2016 Mary Boehlert, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Laurie N. Feldman, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Marvin Kitchens' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 851 , 143 A.3d 1208 (2016), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
